channel.title: LCRUA News Feed
channel.description: A subscriptable feed to keep you up to date with what happens in the LCRUA.

item.title: RSS feed linked to LCRUA Discord
item.author: Fortvento
item.description:
The by-elections for the 5 vacant Council positions have started! Please vote in the poll below if you're a member: https://www.nationstates.net/page=poll/p=125506
Immediately after this by-election the Presidential election will be held, as usual.

item.title: RSS feed linked to LCRUA Discord
item.author: Fortvento
item.description:
The LCRUA's RSS newsfeed has been linked to its Discord! Now any item post on the newsfeed is also automatically posted in our Discord.
If you wish to subscribe to the newsfeed, to be kept up to date without opening NationStates or Discord for example, follow this link with an RSS reader/app: https://lcrua.stuff.ovh/feed.rss

item.title: LCRUA gets RSS feed
item.author: Fortvento
item.description: Hi everyone! This is the first post on the LCRUA's new RSS feed. I hope you'll find it useful.
